channel.title: M'arrillian Invasion on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in M'arrillian Invasion on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Rare Hazard
item.description: In the first episode of the Second Season, we will have a closure for events of the previous episode, with right to terrorism and espionage.

item.title: Dangers of Diplomacy
item.description: In this episode we’ll see that it’s easier to get ants with honey than with vinegar, but that too much honey might not be a very good idea either.

item.title: The Floundering Father
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a blabbermouth knows-it-all father getting real after a quadruple challenge.

item.title: Colosseum Showdown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a small misunderstanding end up in an epic way in the best Real Steel style.

item.title: Rockwave and Roll
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a match between Peyton and his musical idol, with rights to a subtle tribute to one of KISS’ lead singer Gene Simmons.

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see an elite squad led by Chaor in a bold raid on Kiru City towards the Overworld Arsenal.

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll see Chaor’s invasion to the Overworld Arsenal in Kiru City.

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom.

item.title: Time's Up
item.description: In this episode we’ll have a grayish, silent, “Futuresight” with a small and subtle spoiler of the Season’s apex.

item.title: Gigantempopolis
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Gigantempopolis, a desert place, full of mysteries, treasures and, of course, curses, in the best The Lord of the Rings style.

item.title: War Beasts
item.description: In this episode, after a while without mess with other players, Krystella and Klay set up for Peyton to get the scan of a War Beast, a humongous Mipedian titan as powerful as lunatic and, apparently, uncontrollable.

item.title: From the Deep (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, a mysterious Creature from a long forgotten past arises again with astonishing and disturbing revelations about the future of Perim.

item.title: From the Deep (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, betrayal, brainwash, a military coup and the beginning of the end… Let the Invasion begin!

item.title: Tale of Two Toms
item.description: In this episode an easy-going version of our protagonist comes into play and, thanks to an evil pushing, ends up in a fight, in the best Chaotic style.

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force.

item.title: Newbie
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Shinwan, a newcomer headstrong enough to be the first in Chaotic to get a M’arrillian scan.

item.title: Putting the Muge in Mugic
item.description: In this episode we’ll have a common (and unnecessary) territorial war complete with treason, sabotage, counter-espionage and lessons of leadership between OverWorlders and Mipedians.

item.title: Mister E
item.description: In this episode we’ll see more about the power of the M’arrillians and the beginning of one of the possible futures shown in “Time’s Up”.

item.title: When a CodeMaster Calls
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Peyton going on a journey into M’arrillian territory in name of CodeMaster Hotekk in order to become his apprentice… said no one ever.

item.title: Earth to Kaz
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s passion for Chaotic becoming a problem for him when he needs to prove to the psychologist of his school that Chaotic is a real place o.O

item.title: Raznus Returns
item.description: In this episode, a problematic excavation leads some Mandiblors led by Odu-Bathax and Raznus, former OverWorld Ambassador to the Danians, now Assimilated, to the basement of the Arsenal of OverWorld.

item.title: Warriors of Eternity
item.description: In this episode, Sarah is attacked by a Mipedian ghost and her friends, while searching for her, join a group of Mipedians who are searching for the legendary Owayki and his Stone Warriors, immune to the M’arrillian’s mind control.

item.title: UnderWorld Overthrown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Chaor and his loyal fighters execute a battle plan against the M’arrillians in the Marsh of Murk.

item.title: Triple Threat
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the Tribal Alliance overcoming its cultural differences so they united may have a chance against the M’arrillians.

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Last Stand (Part 2)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues in different regions of Perim at once… and in the Tribal Alliance itself as well.

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!
